text: Lady (Hear Me Tonight) is a French househttps://worldradiohistory.com/UK/Music-and- Media/00s/2000/MM-2000-06-24.pdf song by French duo Modjo, released on June 19, 2000. It is from their debut studio album, Modjo. Commercially, the song was a big success, peaking the top 10 in 23 countries. ==References== Category:2000 songs
title: Lady (Hear Me Tonight)
